sunithvs/devb.io.summary: Recent updates include several features and fixes, including project ranking, weekly sync script, and bio null case handling. Additional changes involve updating requirements and removing unknown languages from the system. Minor adjustments include improving the build and fetch commands, as well as fixing action username changes. Various pull requests were also merged to implement these changes and maintain a clean repository.

profile_summary:
Sunith VS is a highly skilled backend developer with advanced expertise in multiple programming languages, including Python, C, and TypeScript. As a dedicated professional with a strong foundation in software development, he consistently delivers high-quality solutions that drive innovation and efficiency. His impressive portfolio, comprising 98 public repositories, showcases his technical prowess and dedication to lifelong learning and improvement.

As a reputable developer with a strong professional network and 87 followers, Sunith VS demonstrates exceptional collaboration and communication skills. His experience as a backend developer at Eduport further solidifies his expertise in designing and implementing scalable, efficient solutions that meet the evolving needs of modern applications. With a strong educational background as a CUSATian, Sunith VS combines academic excellence with real-world expertise, making him a valuable asset to any organization seeking a skilled and dependable developer.
